features: 【Easy Setup & High Compatibility】At least 1 full functioning Type-C port, that's all you need to plug and play to start your daily work. This upgraded screen extender is designed to fit 13"-17.3" laptops (MAXIMUM LENGTH: 15.74"). It is compatible with a wide range of operating systems, including Windows, MacOS (NOT COMPATIBLE WITH M1&M2 CHIPS, Pro is ok), Linux, and Android. It can also be used with various devices such as laptops, tablets, PS5, Switch, etc.

【1080P Resolution & 14" IPS FHD Screen】Immerse yourself in the vivid world of our S2 triple laptop monitors, equipped with 14-inch 1080P FHD IPS screens. Experience a clear and vibrant workspace with a brilliant brightness of 300 nits. This elevates your gaming experience, boosts work performance, and supercharges multitasking capabilities.

【Portable and Efficient】The triple portable laptop screen extender delivers powerful performance while remaining lightweight at just 3.57LB. It's incredibly easy to connect to your laptop without the need for any extra accessories, allowing you to increase productivity by up to 300%. With a flexible stand, it ensures stable and steady screens. It conveniently fits into the included carrying bag, making it ideal for those who value both efficiency and mobility while traveling working, and gaming.

【Customizable Settings & Reverse Charge】Take control of your screen experience with our extender's customizable settings. Adjust brightness, sound, contrast, and other parameters with a single button on each screen. The extender supports a 180° screen rotation angle, allowing you to expand and mirror your screen setup as needed. Move your screens to find the perfect angle for your tasks. Additionally, the S2 triple laptop extender can even reverse charge your phone and laptops when connected.

【Dedicated Customer Care】To ensure optimal performance with S2 triple extender, please ensure: 1.Your laptop has at least 1 full-functioned(supports video output) TYPE-C port;2.The maximum length of your laptop: 15.74 inches; 3. Not compatible with Mac M1&M2 chips, but Pro is ok. Rest assured that all our products undergo rigorous pre-sale inspections to ensure quality. If you have any questions regarding compatibility, please don't hesitate to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why does one monitor show "No Signal"? Because your laptop has only one full-functioned Type-C available，please use 1 USB-A to USB-C and 1 USB-C to HDMI cable (2 cables).Or type-C outlet cannot provide more than 5V/2A power, then you need to connect an external 5V/2A adapter to power S2 What're the laptop size requirements? The laptop screen extender is suitable for 13-17.3 inches laptops with a maximum length of 15.74 inch(400mm) How do I make sure my Macbook is working? This monitor is not compatible with the M1 and M2 chips.All versions of MacBook and MacBook Air 2017, MacBook 2012 pro before are not compatible,M1 pro/max M2 pro/max chip and Mac Air 2018-2019 models are available. Are there more incompatible laptop models? Surface Go/Go 2,Go/3/2/4, Pro 6/Pro 7/Pro X,Galaxy Book S/Book Pro 360,Galaxy Chromebook,ENVY X360 13-ay0056AU,ENVY 13,Dell XPS 13 ( 9343 , Early 2015 ),Dell Vostro 1220/1320/15 3000( 3568 ) (3578 )/1720/3300/3400/V13, wuwei Pro 14, Thinkpad X1 Fold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super useful and nice tool
reviews.reviewText: Compared to my desk mounted monitors, the triple monitors is more flexibility , now I can work on my laptop with extended monitors any where. It offers a respectable display quality with good clarity and viewing angles. Plug-and-play setup is convenient, you can do this by connecting the device using Type-C or HDMI. Its compatibility is what makes it particularly useful. It worked perfectly with my laptop.This innovative triple-screen extender empowers you to expand your workspace and productivity wherever you go. When I need to compare documents side by side or use one screen as a reference, having the option to switch between copy, extension, and second screen modes is useful. Although it takes some getting used to, the ability to switch between horizontal and vertical orientations is beneficial. The design is lightweight and relatively portable hanks to its thin profile, these can be folded easily and carried with the laptop in backpack. In conclusion, the extra screen is a useful addition to my workspace, it effectively completes the task. Compatibility and flexibility is main advantages, which make it a useful tool for increasing productivity while working on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great image, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great fit for my laptop. Easy to install, works great and not heavy. Includes a carrying bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This easily allows me to be able to do a multi-screen so that way I'm able to get more work done at 1 time. This screen is super easy to install on my laptop and took me seconds to have it Installed and running. The screen is very durable and has got me through some rough times with my projects and school work. The colors are very vivid and the price is amazing because you get the ability of another laptop without needing to buy another laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good big monitors, matches my lenovo laptop screen, has sound built in
reviews.reviewText: The one thing I like about this portable monitor is that it comes with it's own carrying case. The case is nothing too special. It has an opening on the top so your monitor still is exposed but it is made of decent material and has a pouch in the front for all your cables. There is a velcro strap that you can put on your actual monitors when it is closed to keep it from opening. The portable monitors are nice to have if you are looking for multiple screens that can attach to your laptop but this is not exactly something I can put on my lap anymore due to the extra weight. These monitors are thick but the actual frame is fairly thin for these screen sizes. Regardless of that it is pretty heavy having both monitors on my laptop. My lenovo can support the weight at certain angles but any movement will cause it to lean backwards from the weight. You could close one monitor if you only want to use one as needed. There is a clip on top to give extra support as well as the pressure pinch on the size. It has fits most monitors but be aware that if you have a thick monitor like a gaming laptop, it may not fit. You could however just use the clip on top to hold it but it may not look as nice. This will make your laptop bulkier and not something you can close. If you want stability, the laptop has a stand in the back to handle the additional weight of this monitor. The stand is a bit weird because you have to twist to extend. You can see the "latch" come off to know you can adjust the height. It stand is okay. This one is a bit weird in that it only uses type c on the actual monitor. It comes with a type c to HDMI cable if you want to use hdmi but it is not hdmi to hdmi. I would recommend that you use type c to type c whenever possible to reduce the amount of cables you need but you can use mini HDMI. If you decide to use HDMI to type c you will need to have two cables per monitor. The monitors do have sound output but it is not very loud. I have only been able to play out of one monitor at a time. I am not sure if you can play out of both from one source. I did try to play games on it and it is not too bad. It is definitely not the best monitor to use for gaming but it can be done. The nice thing is that you can easily unlatch this monitor. The latch is pretty strong so you should not have to worry about the latch falling off. The screen is not too easy to scratch but the monitor flips out so the monitor is facing out making it more prone to scratches. The cables are long enough to run from the laptop to your monitors. The type c cable is angled so it does not stick out but the HDMI cable is not nor is the USB A to Type C. One thing I should say that is nice but also can be annoying is that the plugs are in the inner back side of the monitor. It can be harder to plug into but it does help with cable management. There also is no usb hub so you may actually lose your ports. The monitors do not run hot but they will drain your laptop battery super fast. Overall the monitors work really well. It actually comes with a case so you do not have to shop around for a case. The monitors are decent screen size and the screen brightness and viewing is not bad. I am not a fan of the stand adjustment but it holds my screen up. The screens clamp and hold well. The cable port design is nice to help make the cables less messy. The cables provided is not too bad but basic. The sound quality is okay but do not expect anything too crazy. You can game on it but not the best for that. The material is also not bad and sturdy so you do not have to worry about easily cracking the screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my work soooooo much easier
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have to admit I'm in love with having multiple screens now. I wasn't sure how I'd feel about it especially since i tend to wiggle my laptop around a lot as I work or game but now I'm hooked! lolThankfully setting it up was a breeze. With HDMI, USB-A, and Type-C compatibility, it worked like a charm with both my laptops. Biggest plus, it's super travel-friendly, so you can take your extended monitor wherever you go!The picture quality is just stunning. Those vibrant colors and sharp details really make everything pop. Whether I'm working on spreadsheets or gaming, the screen never disappoints. And speaking of gaming, the smooth display ensures a lag-free experience, immersing me in my virtual adventures.NOTE: Not only did this gizmo enhance my productivity during work hours, but it also took my gaming experience to a whole new level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A life saver
reviews.reviewText: Well this was an awesome buy. I had been researching for additional screens to connect to my Mac laptop and there we have it, excellent choice. It was easy to set up and easy to carry around in its own carrying case. I work a lot on the go and this has made life a lot easier. Picture clarity is the same as my Mac Pro , just slightly heavier than what I thought, but so much lighter than carrying an extra screen. I read somewhere it was hard to set up, but no it was easy. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work-at-Home Life Saver!
reviews.reviewText: This screen extender works great for working from home. When used to having two screens in the office, working on one when at home is cumbersome. This screen extender is even better than the office because it offers three screens! Now we have to get a third screen for the office… :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So....have tried with all the cables USB-C to USB-C, USB-C to USB-A. Nothing works. just black screen (doesn't seemed powered up). My laptop has the charger plugged in and is fully charged.....but the external monitors---nothing but blackness. Went to display settings and the Windows doesn't detect any external monitors. Have rebooted....removed cables, put them back on.....nothing.I'll have to return because I can't get it to work.Beautiful packaging, looks like a tremendous product. just wished it worked.

This was a terrific deal! It included multiple cables to connect to a variety of laptops & it's own carrying case/bag which fits everything & keeps it safe when not in use. The additional screens are easy to set up & make work life so much easier. I can now work from bed, the back yard or from cottage still being as productive as sitting at a desk. The resolution is perfect for working from home & not having to buy 2 monitors that have to be stationed at a desk.

reviews.reviewTitle: Si sirve, pero no es para todas las computadoras
reviews.reviewText: Sirve muy bien, sin embargo tienes q configurar la lap top, ya que no permite que se prendan las 2 pantallas extras, por lo que el proceso es tardado, pero de lo demás, el producto si funciona medianamente

J’ai acheté car je n’ai pas de bureau fixe donc pas de place pour avoir des écrans individuels à ranger par la suite.Ultra facile à installer, indications claires. Fonctionne à merveille et c’est parfait pour travailler à plusieurs documents.Facile pour ranger et ne prend pas de place dans le sac attitré.Compact et fonctionnel.

I always struggled working, while away from my home office. This screen extender makes my work away from home a breeze. Super easy set up, all cables required come in the package and even a nice carrying case.
